testData.name: Quest Diagnostics Flow Cytometry MRD Blood Test for Myeloma
testData.description: Novel flow cytometry MRD blood test enabling ultrasensitive detection of residual disease in myeloma, as sensitive as next-generation sequencing with five-day specimen stability

sourceTitle: Quest Diagnostics: Launches Quest Diagnostics Flow Cytometry MRD Blood Test for Myeloma
snippet: Novel flow cytometry MRD blood test enabling ultrasensitive detection of residual disease in myeloma, as sensitive as next-generation sequencing with five-day specimen stability
